band O
structure O
changes O
and O
the O
temperature O
dependent O
XMR O
in O
WTe2 B-MATERIAL
. O

section 3
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/dev/29-01-2020-part2-1705.09146v2.Temperature_independent_band_structure_of_WTe2_as_observed_from_ARPES.pdf.json

, O
our O
present O
findings O

invaluable O

in O

id data_09-04-2020/fold2/dev/29-01-2020-part1-1208.3207v1.Electronic_properties_and_hyperfine_fields_of_nickel_related_complexes_in_diamond.pdf.json

temperatures O

variations O

very O

together O
for O
different O

durable O

on O

due O

effects O
. O

id data_09-04-2020/fold2/dev/28-10-2019-21-10.pdf.json

a O

Young’s O
modulus O
, O
E O
, O
bulk O
modulus O
, O
B O
, O
and O
shear O
modulus O
, O
G O
, O

to O
calculate O

Debye O
temperature O
, O
which O
is O
a O
fundamental O

very O
important O
parameter O
for O
determining O
physical O
properties O
, O
such O
as O
the O
electrical O
conductivity O
versus O
temperature O
described O
by O
the O

formula O
, O
the O
specific O
heat O
, O
the O
melting O
temperature O
, O
and O
the O
elastic O
constants O
. O

section 5
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/dev/01-01-2020-10.pdf.json

the O

temperature O
( O
D O
) O
from O

constants O
, O

use O

methods O
defined O

the O
following O

relations O
[30] O
: O
D O
h O
kB O
3n4 O
Va O
1/3 O
vm O
( O
6 O
) O

sound O

, O

. O

3 O
1/3 O

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/dev/29-01-2020-part1-1308.0439v1.Control_of_Spin_in_La_Mn_Zn_AsO_Alloy_by_Carrier_Doping.pdf.json

of O
spin O
without O
magnetic O
field O
is O
one O
of O
challenges O
in O
developing O

devices O
. O

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/dev/29-01-2020-part1-1308.0439v1.Control_of_Spin_in_La_Mn_Zn_AsO_Alloy_by_Carrier_Doping.pdf.json
In O
an O
attempt O
to O
solve O
this O
problem O
, O
we O
proposed O
a O
novel O
hypothetic O
La O
( O
Mn0 O
. O
5Zn0 O
. O
5 O
) O
AsO O
alloy O
from O
two O
experimentally O
synthesized O
rare O
earth O
element O
transition O
metal O
arsenide O
oxides O
, O
i O
. O
e O
. O
LaMnAsO O
and O
LaZnAsO O
. O
On O
the O
basis O
of O
the O
first O
- O
principles O
calculations O
with O
strong O
- O
correlated O
correction O
, O
we O
found O
that O
the O
La O
( O
Mn0 O
. O
5Zn0 O
. O
5 O
) O
AsO O
alloy O
is O
an O

semiconductor O
at O
ground O
state O
, O
while O
bipolar O
magnetic O
semiconductor O
at O
ferromagnetic O
state O
. O

section 0
id data_09-04-2020/fold2/dev/29-01-2020-part1-1308.0439v1.Control_of_Spin_in_La_Mn_Zn_AsO_Alloy_by_Carrier_Doping.pdf.json
Both O
electron O
and O
hole O
doping O
in O
the O
La O

relaxed O
without O
symmetry O
constraint O
until O
the O
force O
is O
less O
than O
0 O
. O
01 O
eV/Å O
. O

criterion O
for O
the O
total O
energy O
is O

as O

- O
6 O
eV O
. O
